Use a hat: If you lost all your hair, the first and foremost thing you can do to protect your head from sunburn is to wear a hat. There are various types of hats available in the market, such as baseball caps, beanies, and wide-brimmed hats, which can provide adequate protection from the sun.
Apply sunscreen: Apply sunscreen on your scalp before going out in the sun. You can use a broad-spectrum sunscreen with at least SPF 30 to protect your head from harmful UV rays.
Use a scarf: You can wear a scarf around your head to protect it from the sun. A scarf can also provide an additional layer of protection from the wind and cold.
Wear a wig: If you want to look good and feel confident even without hair, you can wear a wig. Wigs are available in various styles and colors, and they can provide adequate protection from the sun.

Useca: If you are looking for a natural solution to protect your head from sunburn, you can use marigold oil. Marigold oil is rich in antioxidants and has anti-inflammatory properties. It can help to soothe and protect your scalp from the sun's harmful rays.
